x_symbol.license: Part of X, a Cross-Browser Javascript Library, Distributed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
x_symbol.description: For each ele/id, call the callback function passing it the element object and the count. Pass any number of ele/id's as arguments - the callback function must be the last argument.

par.name: e
par.note: Any number of element ID strings or objects.

par.name: f
par.note: Function to execute for each element. This must be the last argument.
